The ip ttl decrement disable command disables the device from decreasing the packet TTL by 1 when forwarding IP packets.
The undo ip ttl decrement disable command enables the device to decrease the packet TTL by 1 when forwarding IP packets. The ip ttl decrement disable command disables the device from decreasing the packet TTL by 1 when forwarding IP packets. The undo ip ttl decrement disable command enables the device to decrease the packet TTL by 1 when forwarding IP packets. By default, the device decreases the packet TTL by 1 when forwarding IP packets.
